elements.name: User should able to Search Cause

steps.name: I Click on I Accept cookie
I Click on Find a cause tab
I verify that "Explore our list of charities and good causes to choose the one you want to support" message is display

arguments.val: Explore our list of charities and good causes to choose the one you want to support

steps.name: I Enter any "adh" in the Search Field
I Select "ADHD Foundation" from the Suggestion List
I Should verify "cause" is display on page
